title: Installing solar lighting in Malawi Africa

tasks.task: Installing and operating a solar lighting system.
subtasks: Connecting solar panels to batteries using crocodile clips.
Attaching the charged battery to solar-powered bulbs.
Positioning the solar panel on the roof for optimal sun exposure.
Managing the activation and illumination of the outdoor lights.
Confirming battery capacity sufficient for two bulbs.
Observing user reaction and ensuring satisfaction with the lighting solution.
